translation.en: No sleep around here.
translation.es: Estoy seguro de que vi a alguien. ¿Quién andará ahí?

translation.en: Feckin' sheep!
Seventeen, 18, 19, 20…
Feckin' sheep.
What's wrong with ya?
Where's your mate?
Out there?
Oh shit!
- ♪ We live for the revelry… ♪ -
translation.es: ESPERA A STELLA EN LAS PUERTAS DE ALFEA

translation.en: Wow. You are so lost.
I'm impressed with your confidence in the face of complete ignorance.
translation.es: Me impresiona tu confianza a pesar de tu ignorancia total.

translation.en: Issue is, you're overcommitted. I mean, you're essentially running.
translation.es: El problema es que exageras. Estás casi corriendo.

translation.en: And now that I'm here, you can't give me the satisfaction of turning around--
translation.es: Y no puedes darme la satisfacción de darte la vuelta…

translation.en: I don't need help, but thanks.
I don't remember offering it.
So presumptuous.
You must be a fairy.
I am a fairy.
Sorry, that's just something I never thought I would say.
translation.es: Lo siento, nunca pensé que diría algo así.

translation.en: It's an odd thing, considering you're standing in a courtyard of a college for fairies.
translation.es: Es raro, considerando que estás en una escuela para hadas.

translation.en: We don't have a lot of those where I'm from.
translation.es: En casa no abundan ese tipo de cosas.

translation.en: And what realm are you from?
California.
- Oh, you're not from the Otherworld? - I'm not.
If you want your mind blown, three months ago,
translation.es: ¿Quieres sorprenderte? Hace tres meses, no sabía ni que existía el Otro Mundo.

translation.en: I didn't even know the Otherworld existed.
translation.es: Hace tres meses, no sabía ni que existía el Otro Mundo.

translation.en: If you are lost, which I'm not saying you are,
translation.es: Si estás perdida, lo que no afirmo,

translation.en: and you need help, which I'm not saying I'm offering…
translation.es: y necesitas ayuda, la que no te ofrezco…

translation.en: This is the Specialist Hall.
The Fairy Hall is that way.
Oh, the Specialist Hall. Obviously.
translation.es: El salón de los especialistas, por supuesto.

translation.en: And I definitely know what a Specialist is!
translation.es: Sé lo que es un especialista.

translation.en: - Right. Sorry, I'd be happy to-- - Mansplain it?
- No. - Sure.
Kinda seems like your thing.
translation.es: Me parece que es lo tuyo.

translation.en: Quit perving on the first years.
translation.es: Deja de molestar a las novatas.

translation.en: - Riv, just give me one second. Yeah? - Why? You gonna chase her?
Nope.
How are you, man?
- Bloom. - Yeah. You must be Stella.
translation.es: - Bloom. - Sí. Tú debes ser Stella.

translation.en: Hi.
I was… waiting. I just… I got impatient.
translation.es: Estaba esperándote, pero me puse impaciente.

translation.en: How very American of you. Shall we?
Miss Dowling tells me this is your first time in the Otherworld.
translation.es: Supe que es tu primera vez en el Otro Mundo.

translation.en: I hope your trip was painless.
Miss Dowling gave me a time and location where there'd be a gateway.
translation.es: La Sra. Dowling me informó dónde estaría el portal.

translation.en: It was in the middle of nowhere, so it wasn't convenient.
translation.es: Era un lugar alejado, poco conveniente…

translation.en: The headmistress likes to do things by the book,
and keeping your world a secret from ours is chapter one,
translation.es: y ocultar nuestro mundo es la principal,

translation.en: no matter how inconvenient it may be.
But if you ever want to go back…
translation.es: Y si alguna vez quieres volver…

translation.en: That's a whole lot of ring.
Family heirloom. Gateway ring.
translation.es: Es un anillo portal, reliquia familiar.

translation.en: The only thing that keeps you sane in this place is the ability to leave it.
translation.es: Lo único que me mantiene cuerda en este lugar es poder irme.

translation.en: Your world may not always be thrilling, but it beats this one.
translation.es: Tu mundo no siempre es emocionante, pero le gana a este.

translation.en: There are seven realms in the Otherworld, each a different kind of boring.
translation.es: Hay siete reinos en el Otro Mundo, cada uno es aburrido a su manera.

translation.en: Think of Alfea as your new home.
I'm sure it must be overwhelming, an entirely new world.
translation.es: Debe ser abrumador conocer un mundo nuevo.

translation.en: And yet I saw no less than three people updating their Insta stories.
translation.es: Sin embargo, vi al menos a tres personas subiendo historias a Instagram.

translation.en: I was half- expecting a school full of Tinkerbells zipping around.
translation.es: Esperaba una escuela llena de Campanitas.

translation.en: Disappointed?
Just kinda bummed I didn't see a single pair of wings.
translation.es: Solo lamento no haber visto alas.

translation.en: Hm. Well, we had wings in the past.
As we've evolved, transformation magic has been lost.
translation.es: Al evolucionar, la magia de la transformación se perdió.

translation.en: Also, Tink was an air fairy.
translation.es: Campanita era un hada de aire.

translation.en: You're a fire fairy.
Yeah, that much I know.
- So, when do we… we start? - Classes begin tomorrow.
You'll start with the basics. Learn to use your magic slowly but safely.
translation.es: Empezarás con lo básico. Aprenderás lento y sin riesgos.

translation.en: When you say… slowly…
I mean it.
Magic can be dangerous, as you well know.
translation.es: La magia puede ser peligrosa, como bien sabes.

translation.en: Our curriculum is designed with that in mind.
Trust the process.
The slow process.
Alfea's graduates have ruled realms and led armies.
translation.es: Los graduados de Alfea gobiernan reinos y lideran ejércitos.

translation.en: They've forged powerful relics…
and rediscovered long- lost magic.
They shape the Otherworld.
translation.es: Le dan forma al Otro Mundo.

translation.en: If you succeed here,
you will too.
Well, this place, the Otherworld, uh… Alfea,
translation.es: Este lugar, el Otro Mundo, Alfea…

translation.en: it seems amazing. It…
This isn't my home.
I don't need to rule a realm or lead an army and…
translation.es: No lideraré un reino o un ejército.

translation.en: I'm here because you promised you'd teach me control.
You're here because you knew you had no other choice.
translation.es: Viniste porque no tenías otra opción.

translation.en: How was your flight?
Good. You know, long.
translation.es: Bien. Ya saben, fue un viaje largo.

translation.en: - Well, the room looks nice. - It is.
translation.es: - La habitación se ve bien. - Es linda.

translation.en: - It's big. - Roommates?
Friends?
It's literally hour one of day one, Mom.
translation.es: Llevo literalmente una hora aquí, mamá.

translation.en: Don't glare.
You can learn a lot about people on their first day.
translation.es: Puedes conocer mucho a la gente en su primer día.

translation.en: Everyone seems… cool, I guess.
I mean, it's five girls in an enclosed space,
translation.es: Pero somos cinco chicas en un espacio cerrado,

translation.en: so it's a matter of time before we descend into a Lord of the Flies situation and…
translation.es: así que supongo que pronto recrearemos El señor de las moscas.

translation.en: kill each other.
Lady of the Flies, sweetie. Don't be sexist.
translation.es: La señora de las moscas, no seas sexista.

translation.en: Could you at least make an effort to be social, Bloom?
translation.es: Al menos intenta ser sociable, Bloom.

translation.en: I know how you are. This is a fresh start.
translation.es: Te conozco. Este es un nuevo comienzo.

translation.en: - Don't just sit in your room-- - Got it, Mom. Thank you.
translation.es: - No te quedes en el cuarto… - Lo sé, mamá. Gracias.

translation.en: Hey, I see a window. Do you have a nice view?
translation.es: Oye, veo una ventana. ¿Tienes linda vista?

translation.en: No, the first years have crap views.
translation.es: Los de primero no tienen linda vista.

translation.en: Well, I bet the worst view of the Alps is better than the best view of Gardenia.
translation.es: Pero la peor vista de los Alpes supera la mejor vista de Gardenia.

translation.en: What time is it there, by the way? It seems bright.
translation.es: ¿Qué hora es allá? Hay mucha luz.

translation.en: Yeah, actually, um, it…
- All right. - It's… It's…
- Lights out. Phones off. - Uh, gotta go, guys.
translation.es: - Apaguen las luces y los teléfonos. - Debo irme.

translation.en: - I love you. - Love you too, sweetie.
You're a lifesaver.
I'll answer to that.
Or to Aisha.
Just wanted to get in your good graces so you don't go Lady of the Flies on me.
translation.es: Te ayudé para que no me ataques, señora de las moscas.

translation.en: Do I wanna know why they think you're in the Alps?
translation.es: ¿Por qué creen que estás en los Alpes?

translation.en: My… parents are both human.
So they think that Alfea is an international boarding school in Switzerland.
translation.es: Así que creen que Alfea es un internado internacional en Suiza.

translation.en: Human parents, fairy daughter?
Miss Dowling said there's, um, a fairy somewhere in my family tree,
translation.es: La Sra. Dowling dice que hay un hada en mi árbol genealógico,

translation.en: like a long- dormant magical bloodline.
translation.es: algo como un linaje mágico latente.

translation.en: One of these days, I'm gonna get used to how absolutely ridiculous this all sounds.
translation.es: Algún día me acostumbraré a lo ridículo que suena todo esto.

translation.en: Oh my God.
Are you the one person in the universe who's never read Harry Potter?
translation.es: ¿Me vas a decir que nunca has leído Harry Potter?

translation.en: Please. If you knew how many hours I have wasted taking Sorting Hat quizzes…
translation.es: Por favor, si supieras cuántos tests del Sombrero Seleccionador hice…

translation.en: Ravenclaw?
Sometimes Slytherin, yeah.
That explains the lies then.
Hm. Let me guess. Gryffindor.
Explains the judgment.
May I help you?
Are you changing?  I am.
I thought the orientation party was a casual thing.
translation.es: Creía que la fiesta de orientación era informal.

translation.en: It is.
So, a casual thing you're changing for?
People have seen me in this outfit already.
translation.es: La gente ya me vio vestida así.

translation.en: They'll expect something different.
People expect you to wear multiple outfits a day?
translation.es: ¿La gente espera que uses varios atuendos al día?

translation.en: People expect me to care how I look.
translation.es: Esperan que me importe cómo me veo.

translation.en: Something else?
That light, that's… magic.
How exactly do you--
I'm a mentor, not a tutor.
Look, this is something you'll learn on your first day in class,
translation.es: Lo aprenderás tu primer día de clase.

translation.en: but fairy magic is linked to emotion.
translation.es: La magia de las hadas está ligada a la emoción.

translation.en: It could be good thoughts, could be bad.
translation.es: Pueden ser buenos o malos pensamientos.

translation.en: Love. Hatred. Fear.
The stronger the emotion, the stronger the magic.
translation.es: Una emoción fuerte genera magia fuerte.

translation.en: So, do you…  …do you hate me or do you fear me?
You were just looking at me when you did the… spell.
translation.es: Me estabas mirando cuando hiciste… el hechizo.

translation.en: I'm pretty sure you don't love me, so…
translation.es: Sé que no me amas, así que…

translation.en: Well, I don't know you.
But I'm sure once I do, I'll find…
translation.es: Pero cuando lo haga, seguro hallaré…

translation.en: something to love.
Yeah.
Shared space, Terra.
Everyone loved The Secret Garden because it was a secret.
translation.es: Todos amaban el jardín secreto porque era secreto.

translation.en: Actually, that's not quite the message of The Secret Garden.
translation.es: Ese no es el mensaje de El jardín secreto.

translation.en: It's a story about how when things are kept private their benefits aren't fully appreciated.
translation.es: Es que si no compartes las cosas, sus beneficios no se aprovechan.

translation.en: OK.
Well, she seems lovely.
She's just having fun.
I know it's a lot. Shocker. Earth fairy called Terra likes plants.
translation.es: ¡Sorpresa! A Terra, el hada de tierra, le gustan las plantas.

translation.en: It's a family thing. I've got this cousin called Flora,
translation.es: Es de familia. Mi prima se llama Flora,

translation.en: my mum's Rose, and my dad works in the greenhouse here.
translation.es: mi mamá Rose, y papá trabaja en el invernadero.

translation.en: That's why I know a load of second years. I grew up around Alfea, so…
translation.es: Por eso conozco a los de segundo. Crecí cerca de Alfea…

translation.en: Stella's a second year? Why is she in a suite with first years?
translation.es: ¿Stella es de segundo? ¿Qué hace aquí entonces?

translation.en: Oh yeah! Um…
Uh, I dunno, uh, really.
Uh, an administrative thing…
Also, sorry, I just wouldn't bring it up with her.
translation.es: Disculpa, yo no se lo mencionaría.

translation.en: You know? Um, let's all of us just blanket statement, Who cares?
translation.es: ¿Sabes? Es mejor que actuemos como si no importara.

translation.en: Do you want a succulent?
They're really hip, low maintenance, very you.
translation.es: Son modernas e independientes, como tú.

translation.en: - Sorry. Not that I know you. - If I take it, will you stop talking?
translation.es: - Aunque no te conozco… - Si acepto, ¿te callarás?

translation.en: - Terra, I'm just having fun. - OK.
Thank you.
- Actually, this one might be… -
Musa?
- Did you say you grew up at Alfea? - I did.
translation.es: ¿Creciste aquí? Sí, te diré que tuve una infancia muy extraña, pero…

translation.en: Weird childhood, let me tell you. But--
translation.es: Sí, te diré que tuve una infancia muy extraña, pero…

translation.en: I went for a swim in the river, but I don't suppose this place has a pool?
translation.es: Fui a nadar al río, fue genial, pero ¿no tienen piscina?

translation.en: - Wait. Did you say you've been swimming? - Mm. I go twice a day every day.
translation.es: - ¿Fuiste a nadar? - Sí, voy dos veces todos los días.

translation.en: - But you just got here. - You do know what every day means?
translation.es: - Acabas de llegar. - Dije todos los días.

translation.en: Well, the only thing close is the pond where the Specialists train,
translation.es: Está el estanque donde entrenan los especialistas.

translation.en: but nobody swims there, at least not on purpose.
translation.es: Pero nadie nada ahí, no a propósito.

translation.en: - There's something about her. - What, you're smitten after one chat?
translation.es: - Tiene algo especial. - ¿Te enamoraste luego de una charla?

translation.en: What is it with you and the crazy ones?
How do you know she's crazy? You haven't even met her.
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabes que está loca? Aún no la conoces.

translation.en: She's a ginge. They're all nuts. Amazing shags though.
translation.es: Todas las pelirrojas están locas. Pero son muy buenas en la cama.

translation.en: Oh, you speak from experience? Didn't realize your hand was a redhead.
translation.es: ¿Tienes experiencia? No sabía que tu mano era pelirroja.

translation.en: You got slow this summer.
Correction.
I got high this summer.
Really?
Whatever big- brother speech you're about to give me…
translation.es: Si me sermonearás como hermano mayor…

translation.en: - There's no speech. - …I don't wanna hear it.
A more productive use of your time would be to distract your aggro father figure
translation.es: Por qué mejor no distraes a tu agresiva figura paterna

translation.en: so I don't got expelled.
So, after your classes,
you are all mine.
And I like the things I own to work well, so you will train every day.
translation.es: Y me gusta que mis cosas funcionen bien, así que entrenarán todos los días.

translation.en: Find your skill.
Hone your skill.
And eventually even you…
can fight like him.
He fights even better with a bit of advance warning.
translation.es: Lucho mejor con un poco de aviso.

translation.en: He did all right. Favored his left, but what else is new?
translation.es: Estuvo bien. Abusaste de la izquierda, como siempre.

translation.en: Sky's father was Andreas of Eraklyon.
translation.es: El padre de Sky era Andreas de Eraklyon.

translation.en: That made him a legacy admission,
but he still showed up on the first day and did the work.
translation.es: pero se esforzó desde el inició y trabajó duro.

translation.en: Well done.
I expect nothing less from the rest of you,
translation.es: Es lo mínimo que espero de todos ustedes,

translation.en: whether you're third generation and your parents demanded you come
translation.es: ya sean herederos de una familia que les exigió que vinieran

translation.en: or if I personally selected you from your realms for service.
translation.es: o si yo los seleccioné en sus reinos para el servicio.

translation.en: That decision was made
based on your natural talents in combat and weaponry,
translation.es: en sus talentos naturales para el combate y las armas,

translation.en: and I expect to see that skill in evidence daily.
translation.es: y quiero verlos demostrar esa habilidad todos los días.

translation.en: This place will seem like hell…
translation.es: Este lugar les parecerá un infierno…

translation.en: until actual hell comes.
translation.es: hasta que llegue el infierno real.

translation.en: We are the first line of defense.
translation.es: Somos la primera línea de defensa,

translation.en: - A certainty when the future is uncertain. -
translation.es: una certeza cuando el futuro es incierto.

translation.en: Is that funny?
It's just you're talking about preparing for the future in a castle with kids using swords.
translation.es: Habla de prepararse para el futuro en un castillo con niños que usan espadas.

translation.en: Must be nice to live in a world where you can be so soft,
translation.es: Debe ser lindo vivir en un mundo donde puedes ser blando.

translation.en: where you fear so little, disrespect seems an option.
translation.es: Donde no temes, así que puedes ser irrespetuoso.

translation.en: Do you know why the Barrier exists?
To protect the school from Burned Ones.
translation.es: Para proteger a la escuela de los quemados.

translation.en: Have you ever seen a Burned One?
Nobody my age has.
translation.es: No, como nadie de mi edad.

translation.en: But that's kinda my point.
- Isn't that all over now? - What if it's not?
Do you think you would know what to do?
I was ten when I saw one for the first time.
translation.es: Tenía diez años la primera vez que vi uno.

translation.en: I was gathering firewood with my father, and we heard it.
translation.es: Estaba juntando leña con mi padre y lo oímos.

translation.en: - It was like a rasp. -
A clicking.
My father shot it twice. Once in its chest, once in its head.
translation.es: Mi padre le disparó dos veces: al pecho y a la cabeza.

translation.en: It didn't matter.
Burned Ones have inhuman speed and strength,
translation.es: Los quemados tienen velocidad y fuerza inhumanas

translation.en: and if they cut you,
translation.es: y si te hacen un corte,

translation.en: the infection that follows is swift and severe.
translation.es: la infección que provoca es rápida y grave.

translation.en: I watched it happen.
I watched the light dim from my father's eyes,
translation.es: Cómo se apagaba la luz de mi padre.

translation.en: and when he dropped his shotgun, I knew what I had to do.
translation.es: Y cuando dejó caer su escopeta, supe lo que debía hacer.

translation.en: Be thankful you've never seen a Burned One.
translation.es: Agradece que nunca has visto a un quemado.

translation.en: But if you ever do,
pray that it kills you so the ones you love will not have to.
translation.es: reza para que te mate y no deban hacerlo los que amas.

translation.en: It's fresh.
Maybe a wolf?
Or a bear.
Could have gone out to protect his herd, got surprised.
translation.es: Tal vez lo tomó por sorpresa y defendió a su manada.

translation.en: I'm happy to continue the guessing game, but…
This is char residue.
How long since the last sighting?
- About two decades. - Sixteen years. Rosalind was relentless.
translation.es: - Dos décadas. - Dieciséis años. Rosalind fue implacable.

translation.en: - Could've been hiding-- - She killed all the Burned Ones.
translation.es: - Quizá se escondió… - Exterminó a los quemados.

translation.en: We thought she did.
Ben, what we think is irrelevant. The Barrier's doing its job.
translation.es: Lo que creemos es irrelevante. La barrera funciona.

translation.en: Until we know something for sure, let's clean this up before gossip starts.
translation.es: No sabemos nada. Limpiemos para evitar los chismes.

translation.en: Who actually saw the shepherd's body?
Maybe he was just old. People get old, die. We all die.
translation.es: Quizá murió de viejo, todos morimos.

translation.en: That old- age decapitation really sneaks up on you.
translation.es: Claro, la famosa decapitación de la vejez.

translation.en: Happened to my nan right in the middle of bingo.
translation.es: Le pasó a mi abuela en medio del bingo…

translation.en: - Down the table. -
- No judgment, but… - I eat a million calories a day.
translation.es: - No te juzgo, pero… - Como muchísimo al día.

translation.en: If I didn't swim, I'd be massive.
- I used to dance. I get it. - On that note…
translation.es: - Yo bailaba, lo entiendo. - Hablando de eso…

translation.en: Second round. Damn! Twice a day every day. You weren't kidding.
translation.es: ¡Vaya! Dos veces al día, todos los días. No estabas bromeando.

translation.en: So you did hear her earlier?
What?
In the room. Um…
You had your headphones on and ignored me as though you couldn't hear me,
translation.es: Te pusiste los audífonos y fingiste que no podías oírme,

translation.en: but you did hear Aisha.
Sometimes I just wear my headphones when I don't feel like talking.
translation.es: A veces los uso cuando no quiero hablar.

translation.en: Yeah. It just seems like that happens a lot…
around me.
It's a me thing. It's not you.
translation.es: Es algo mío. No es tu culpa.

translation.en: You've said enough. I've said too much.
Dad? Where you going? Greenhouse?
- Anything you need help with? - That is not going to happen, love.
It's your first day. No hiding in the greenhouse.
translation.es: Es tu primer día. No te escondas en el invernadero.

translation.en: You wanted to go to Alfea your entire life.
Mingle.
- Be you. - OK.
Uh, the headmistress is busy. You'll have to book an appointment.
translation.es: La directora está ocupada. Debes pedir una cita.

translation.en: - Excuse me? - I'll just take a water. Room temp.
- Thanks, love. -
If the door is closed, it means she doesn't want--
translation.es: Si la puerta está cerrada, significa que no…

translation.en: Headmistress Dowling!
I'm Beatrix, and I'm probably going to sound like an arsehole right now,
translation.es: Me llamo Beatrix y, probablemente, sonaré como una pendeja,

translation.en: but I'm literally your biggest fan.
Probably shouldn't have said arsehole in front of the headmistress!
translation.es: No debería haber dicho pendeja frente a la directora.

translation.en: Bollocks. Shit!
- On a winning streak, I see. - Sorry. For all of it.
translation.es: - Qué buena racha, ¿no? - Lo siento. Por todo.

translation.en: It's just I've waited my whole life for this, to be here.
translation.es: Es que he esperado toda mi vida por esto. Por estar aquí.

translation.en: I'm obsessed with this place, its history,
translation.es: Estoy obsesionada con la historia de este lugar

translation.en: your history.
Noted.
Perhaps you'd like to study that history in the library? I have work to do.
translation.es: Puedes estudiar historia en la biblioteca. Debo trabajar.

translation.en: - You can't make me go out! - It's Saturday. Get out of your room.
translation.es: No puedes obligarme. Es sábado, sal de tu cuarto. Sal de la casa.

translation.en: Get out of the house.
translation.es: Es sábado, sal de tu cuarto. Sal de la casa.

translation.en: I literally went out earlier today.
Go to the movies. Go to a party.
translation.es: Ve al cine o a una fiesta.

translation.en: Go somewhere that's not a rummage sale or an antique store.
translation.es: No a ventas de garaje o a tiendas de antigüedades.

translation.en: Oh, I see. So it's not enough I go out.
translation.es: Entonces no basta con que salga.

translation.en: I have to be a basic bitch like my mom was. Better that than some weird loner.
translation.es: - Debo ser básica como tú. - Mejor que ser una ermitaña rara.

translation.en: Wow, you just called your daughter a weird loner.
translation.es: Acabas de llamar ermitaña rara a tu hija.

translation.en: Take a parenting class!
I'm worried about you, Bloom.
Maybe worry about why you have so little going on in your sad life
translation.es: Mejor preocúpate de por qué tu vida es tan aburrida

translation.en: that you're obsessed with the tedious minutiae of mine.
translation.es: que estás obsesionada con mis tediosas minucias.

translation.en: - This is a lot of people. -
What?
You don't have parties in… California?
Oh, he remembers!
Oh, impressed?
Where can I go that's the opposite…
translation.es: ¿Hay algún lugar que sea todo lo contrario a esto?

translation.en: of this? What's outside?
- What, beyond the Barrier? - Mm- hmm.
Well, depending on rumors,
wolves, bears, or something much scarier.
translation.es: Lobos, osos o algo mucho más aterrador.

translation.en: But no people?
- Um-- - Perfect, thanks.
At the risk of, um… mansplaining,
translation.es: A riesgo de que suene a machoexplicación,

translation.en: it is dangerous outside right now. You probably shouldn't go alone.
translation.es: es peligroso salir ahora. No deberías ir sola.

translation.en: Are you offering to escort me?
Is that what this is? It's not the worst pickup line.
translation.es: ¿Sí? No es la peor técnica de conquista.

translation.en: - It wasn't a line. - Mm. - Trust me? - Hm.
translation.es: No era una técnica. Confía en mí.

translation.en: I just met you, but maybe one day I will.
translation.es: Acabo de conocerte, pero quizá algún día.

translation.en: Hey, Sky. Can we talk?
I haven't seen you all day. Summer, Stella. All summer.
translation.es: - No te he visto en todo el día. - No nos vimos en todo el verano.

translation.en: You know that girl you were talking to, Bloom?
translation.es: Esa chica con la que estabas hablando, Bloom,

translation.en: She's my suite- mate.
What does that mean, Stel?
- That I can't talk to her? - I didn't say that.
What are you saying, specifically?
I'd hate to make you upset. I know what happens when you get upset.
translation.es: Odiaría molestarte. Sé lo que pasa cuando te enojas.

translation.en: I'm sure you'll do the right thing. I always do.
translation.es: - Sé que harás lo correcto. - Como siempre.

translation.en: Enjoy the show?
Right. Good thoughts.
Pictures of my sad teenage years, not happy thoughts.
translation.es: Las fotos de mi triste adolescencia no despiertan felicidad.

translation.en: Noted.
No!
- What are you doing here? - It's OK, Bloom.
- It's OK. - Aisha, you should not be here.
translation.es: - Está bien. - No deberías estar aquí.

translation.en: Neither should you. You're losing control.
Yes, I know that.
Calm down. If you get angry at me--
translation.es: Cálmate. - Si te enojas conmigo… - ¡Vete de aquí!

translation.en: Just go… away!
translation.es: - Si te enojas conmigo… - ¡Vete de aquí!

translation.en: Aisha, run!
No, you shouldn't have been out there.
Is that American for sorry I almost set you on fire?
translation.es: ¿Es tu forma de disculparte por casi quemarme?

translation.en: You were a runaway train with no idea what you were doing.
translation.es: Veo que no tienes idea de qué haces.

translation.en: Which is why I was out there alone trying to figure it out.
translation.es: Por eso estaba sola intentando averiguarlo.

translation.en: Brilliant idea.
I'm not like the rest of you.
I didn't grow up here. I don't have fairy parents.
translation.es: No crecí aquí. Mis padres no son hadas, yo…

translation.en: I've done magic once in my life and it was…
translation.es: He hecho magia solo una vez y fue…

translation.en: What? Terrible? I'm shocked.
I flooded my entire secondary school after I failed a math test.
translation.es: Inundé toda mi secundaria al reprobar un examen de matemáticas.

translation.en: Taps, sprinklers, toilets…
Have you ever waded through human poo?
I have.
Not pleasant.
Sometimes being a fairy means you have to deal with shit.
translation.es: A veces las hadas deben lidiar con cosas desagradables.

translation.en: So my…
mom and I don't really get along.
translation.es: No me llevo bien con mi mamá.

translation.en: I know. It's a shocker. I'm not…
translation.es: Lo sé, qué sorpresa. No soy…

translation.en: exactly the ideal daughter for her.
She'd love a cheerleader, and I'm…
translation.es: Quería una porrista y yo soy…

translation.en: whatever the opposite of a cheerleader is.
translation.es: todo lo contrario a una porrista.

translation.en: - What the actual hell? - Slam your door, lose your door.
translation.es: ¿Qué demonios hacen? Si das portazos, pierdes la puerta.

translation.en: Dad? Dad. Dad, she's crazy. You know that.
You need to be more open with us.
So, this is a good start? Teaching your daughter she has no privacy
translation.es: ¿Y así lo lograrán? ¿Quitándole a su hija su privacidad, sus límites y su autonomía?

translation.en: or boundaries or agency?
translation.es: ¿Quitándole a su hija su privacidad, sus límites y su autonomía?

translation.en: Don't you feminist with me. This basic bitch'll break out her bullhorn
translation.es: No me vengas con feminismos. Seré básica, pero romperé tu megáfono y te daré una lección.

translation.en: and her dissertation and take your ass to school.
translation.es: Seré básica, pero romperé tu megáfono y te daré una lección.

translation.en: Every comeback is another week without your door. Hit me.
translation.es: Cada respuesta es otra semana sin puerta, ¿algo más?

translation.en: That's what I thought.
That night, I… couldn't sleep.
Every time I closed my eyes, the rage just kept building.
translation.es: Cada vez que cerraba los ojos, la ira seguía creciendo.

translation.en: Then it happened.
It was almost like the fire had a life of its own.
translation.es: Era casi como si el fuego tuviera vida propia.

translation.en: I don't remember how long I let it burn. I just remember their screams.
translation.es: No recuerdo cuánto tiempo lo dejé arder. Solo recuerdo… sus gritos.

translation.en: Bloom! Bloom!
Somebody help us!
Please!
Mom? Is she OK?
Get her outta here!
My mom was…
covered in third- degree burns…
translation.es: cubierta de quemaduras de tercer grado.

translation.en: 'cause of me.
Every night after that, I…
translation.es: Luego de eso, me escapaba cada noche.

translation.en: I snuck out. I was so…
translation.es: Luego de eso, me escapaba cada noche. Tenía tanto miedo de volver a lastimarlos

translation.en: scared that I'd hurt them again…
translation.es: Tenía tanto miedo de volver a lastimarlos

translation.en: that I slept in this…  …creepy- ass…  …warehouse near my house
translation.es: que dormía en un horrible depósito cerca de mi casa.

translation.en: until Miss Dowling found me.
translation.es: Y la Sra. Dowling me halló.

translation.en: All right. Fire story beats shit story.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Eso es peor que el excremento.

translation.en: You win.
And your parents had no idea it was you?
translation.es: ¿Y tus padres no supieron que fuiste tú?

translation.en: I don't know how distant my fairy ancestors are, but…
translation.es: No sé a cuándo se remontan mis ancestros hadas, pero…

translation.en: the most mystical thing my parents believe in is knocking on wood.
translation.es: en lo más místico que creen mis padres es en tocar madera.

translation.en: What?
It's just odd.
You drew on a good deal of magic without even trying.
translation.es: Usaste mucha magia sin siquiera intentarlo.

translation.en: It's hard to believe you're from a dormant bloodline.
translation.es: Es difícil creer que eres de un linaje latente.

translation.en: Is there any chance you're adopted?  No.
No, I… No, I've heard the story of my birth a million times.
translation.es: He oído la historia de mi nacimiento miles de veces.

translation.en: Miracle baby. I…
had a heart defect in the womb, but a day after I was born, it was gone.
translation.es: Tenía un defecto cardíaco en el útero y desapareció cuando nací.

translation.en: Oh God. You… You're a changeling.
What's that?
Aisha, what's a changeling?
A changeling is a fairy baby that's switched with a human one at birth.
translation.es: Es un bebé de hadas que intercambian con un humano al nacer.

translation.en: - Wait, what? - It's barbaric. It barely happens anymore.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - Es una barbarie, ya casi no pasa.

translation.en: That's not possible.
You're clearly very powerful, Bloom. You have to be pure- blooded.
translation.es: Eres muy poderosa. Debes tener sangre pura.

translation.en: I would know if my parents weren't my parents, Aisha.
translation.es: Si mis padres no fueran mis padres lo sabría, Aisha.

translation.en: Why would you even say that?
I'm just trying to help.
Well, you're not.
What the hell did you tell her?
The truth. Because someone's been lying to her.
translation.es: La verdad. Alguien le ha estado mintiendo.

translation.en: Want some?
- No. I just-- - There's two types of first years.
translation.es: - No, yo… - Solo hay dos tipos de novatos.

translation.en: - Pussies and aspiring former pussies. -
translation.es: Los cobardes y los que aspiran a dejar de ser cobardes.

translation.en: Sorta feels like it's less a binary choice and more a spectrum, but…
translation.es: Creo que no es una opción binaria, sino un espectro…

translation.en: Cheers. - No. -
Cheers when you're done.
Are you bullying the first years? Be more basic.
- I can't bully the willing, right? - I don't know what that means.
translation.es: - No se intimida a los dispuestos. - No sé qué significa eso.

translation.en: Just ignore him. He thinks he's some badass.
translation.es: Solo ignóralo. Se cree rudo, pero es solo un nerd que finge ser genial.

translation.en: You should've seen him last year. He's just a tragic nerd in disguise.
translation.es: Se cree rudo, pero es solo un nerd que finge ser genial.

translation.en: And she's just three people in disguise.
translation.es: Y tú pesas más que tres chicas geniales.

translation.en: - Whoa. Come on, man. - No, I've got this.
People always think that they can treat the big girl like shit
translation.es: La gente cree que puede tratar mal a las chicas grandotas,

translation.en: because we're… we're sweet,
and we're harmless, and we should be happy that you're even talking to us.
translation.es: e inofensivas y deberíamos alegrarnos de que nos hables.

translation.en: But sometimes, we've had a really, really bad day,
translation.es: Pero a veces hemos tenido un día realmente malo,

translation.en: and some scrawny little arsehole says the wrong thing at the wrong time,
translation.es: un imbécil escuálido dice algo en un mal momento

translation.en: and we're not happy you're talking to us, and we're not sweet, and most of all,
translation.es: y ya no nos alegra que nos hables, no somos dulces y…

translation.en: we are not harmless.
Huh? Sorry?
What was that, Riv? I…
I'm sure it's really funny, but I can't quite hear it.
translation.es: De seguro es gracioso, pero no puedo oírlo.

translation.en: - You could've killed me, you freak. - Missed you too.
translation.es: - Casi me matas. - También te extrañé.

translation.en: Sorry, I'm Terra. That wasn't my ideal first impression.
translation.es: Lo siento, soy Terra. Esa no fue la mejor manera de presentarme.

translation.en: Is it better or worse than throwing up after a single drink?
translation.es: ¿Es mejor o peor que vomitar después de un trago?

translation.en: Oh no. Come on, quickly.
Is that your family?
I get homesick too sometimes.
translation.es: A veces me da mucha nostalgia.

translation.en: But my mum…
Honestly, if she didn't force me to go here, I wouldn't.
translation.es: Si no me hubiera obligado a venir, no estaría aquí.

translation.en: I'd live at home,
go to school, just have a normal life.
translation.es: iría a la escuela, tendría una vida normal.

translation.en: You know there's no shame in that?
translation.es: No hay que avergonzarse de eso.

translation.en: No shame in wanting to be home.
She's blanking my texts.
Strange. I wonder if it's because she poured her heart out to you and you called her a freak?
translation.es: ¿Será porque se sinceró contigo y la llamaste bicho raro?

translation.en: - Have you seen Bloom? - Not recently.
- Yes? - Your face looks so calm, yet you're racked with guilt.
translation.es: - ¿Sí? - Te ves tranquila, pero sientes culpa.

translation.en: You're a mind fairy.
translation.es: Eres un hada de la mente.

translation.en: A mind fairy?
- What's your connection? Memory-- - Not a great time.
translation.es: - ¿Cuál es tu conexión? Recuerdos… - Ahora no.

translation.en: - Is everything OK? - Not really.
I'm looking for Bloom. For some reason, Stella's feeling guilty about it.
translation.es: Busco a Bloom y Stella se siente culpable.

translation.en: Could everyone save the drama for drama club?
translation.es: Dejen el drama para el club de teatro.

translation.en: Wasn't she talking to Sky?
And?
And I know what happened to the last person who was talking to Sky.
translation.es: Y sé lo que le pasó a la última persona que habló con Sky.

translation.en: - I was here last year, remember? -
Stella, where's Bloom?
She was feeling homesick,
so I did a nice thing, and I lent her my ring so that she could go back to the First World.
translation.es: Fui buena y le presté mi anillo para que pudiera regresar al Primer Mundo.

translation.en: Doesn't it only work outside the Barrier?
translation.es: Tu anillo solo funciona fuera de la barrera.

translation.en: Yes, and there's a gateway in the old cemetery.
translation.es: Sí, y hay un portal en el viejo cementerio.

translation.en: That's deep in the forest, Stella.
translation.es: Eso es en el bosque, Stella.

translation.en: You know what's out there, right?
- It's Bloom. - Hmm.
Whoa! Twice in one day.
translation.es: ¡Vaya! Dos veces en un mismo día.

translation.en: - Hold on, I'm calling the news. -
Real Chatty Cathy here. All it took was moving across the world.
translation.es: Mudarte a otro país te puso comunicativa.

translation.en: I know, right?
Easy solutions.
- Hey, you wanna video chat? - No. Um…
I just wanted to check in 'cause we got cut off before, and…
translation.es: Solo quería saludarlos, porque tuve que cortarles antes y…

translation.en: - You must be jet- lagged. - Mm. Probably.
Is everything OK, Bloom?
Yeah, I'm…
I'm OK.
You know, you don't have to be OK.
You're only 16.
I couldn't have done it when I was your age.
translation.es: Yo no habría podido hacerlo a tu edad.

translation.en: You should be thankful you have your mom's bravery.
What if I… What if I…
like, made a mistake?
You're too special for here. It's not who you are.
translation.es: Eres muy especial, este no es tu lugar.

translation.en: What if you don't know who I am?
Hey, we are your parents, Bloom. If we don't know you, nobody does.
translation.es: Somos tus padres, Bloom. Nadie te conoce mejor que nosotros.

translation.en: Is there something else?
Something you wanna tell us?
No, you're right.
Alfea's where I belong now.
Bloom, listen to me.
Whatever you're going through, I know it sucks, but I also know you can handle it.
translation.es: Quizá lo que estás pasando apesta, pero sé que puedes manejarlo.

translation.en: I always knew your path wouldn't be like everyone else's.
translation.es: Siempre supe que tu camino sería diferente.

translation.en: - - Not like mine or your father's.
translation.es: No como el mío o el de tu padre.

translation.en: That's hard.
But at the end of it,
I can't wait to see who you become.
We love you, Bloom.
I love you too.
Please, please, please…
Don't stop now.
- Are you OK? -
Yeah. Yeah, yeah, I think so. What the hell was that thing?
translation.es: Sí, eso creo. - ¿Qué fue eso? - Creo que les llaman quemados.

translation.en: - I'm pretty sure it's called a Burned One. - Huh?
translation.es: - ¿Qué fue eso? - Creo que les llaman quemados.

translation.en: - Wait. Where… where's Stella? - She's at school. Why?
translation.es: - ¿Y Stella? - Está en la escuela, ¿por qué?

translation.en: That thing just took her ring.
You can't be in here, Stel.
If Silva finds out…
I'll leave before the sun comes up.
translation.es: Me iré antes de que salga el sol.

translation.en: You can't pull this shit, Stel… You broke up with me.
translation.es: No puedes hacer esto, Stel. Tú terminaste conmigo.

translation.en: No, I know.
I didn't hear from you all summer, and then I say two words to a first year?
translation.es: No supe de ti en todo el verano, y cuando le hablo a una novata…

translation.en: I said I know, OK?
I'm sorry.
What are you doing here?
I got jealous.
Yeah, I know I'm not allowed to, but I did.
translation.es: Sé que no debería, pero es verdad.

translation.en: And I did something really stupid.
translation.es: Así que hice algo muy estúpido.

translation.en: - Now they all think I'm a monster. - Oh, Stel…
translation.es: Ahora creen que soy un monstruo.

translation.en: No, please. I can't sleep in there, Sky.
translation.es: - Stel… - Por favor. No puedo dormir ahí, Sky.

translation.en: In a room where everybody hates me.
translation.es: En un cuarto donde todas me odian.

translation.en: Please. Tonight, can I just stay with you?
translation.es: Por favor. ¿Puedo quedarme contigo esta noche?

translation.en: Next to someone who doesn't… hate me.
translation.es: Al lado de alguien que no me odie.

translation.en: You're better than you think you are, Stella.
translation.es: Eres mejor de lo que crees, Stella.

translation.en: Other people can't see that if you don't.
translation.es: Y si tú no lo crees, nadie lo hará.

translation.en: The headmistress will take care of the Burned One, Bloom.
translation.es: La directora se encargará del quemado, Bloom.

translation.en: She won't leave it in the First World.
translation.es: No lo dejará en tu mundo.

translation.en: Don't worry.
Your parents are safe.
Thanks.
Are you burning the midnight oil?
Snorting the midnight Adderall is more like it.
But I'll need sleep eventually.
translation.es: Pero, en algún momento, necesitaré dormir.

translation.en: Hands are kinda full.
You're a first year.
I'm a lot of things.
So I know you want to listen to your music,
translation.es: Sé que quieres escuchar tu música y realmente lo entiendo.

translation.en: and I, uh, I totally get that, um, but we are…
translation.es: Sé que quieres escuchar tu música y realmente lo entiendo. Pero estaremos…

translation.en: stuck together for a while.
translation.es: todas juntas por un buen tiempo.

translation.en: So…
I borrowed this off my brother. It's a speaker, so we don't have to talk.
translation.es: Se lo pedí a mi hermano. Un parlante, así no tenemos que hablar.

translation.en: You can be in your world. You just…
won't be alone in it.
Or not. It's no… It's not a big deal.
translation.es: O no. No es gran cosa.

translation.en: - Don't be angry. - I'm not.
translation.es: - No te enojes. - No me enojo.

translation.en: Can you stop with the fake happy bullshit for one second?
translation.es: Deja de fingir felicidad un minuto.

translation.en: I'm a genuinely happy person.
And I'm an empath.
I can feel everything that you feel.
translation.es: Puedo sentir todo lo que tú sientes.

translation.en: Your anxiety with me, your insecurity with Stella,
translation.es: Tu ansiedad conmigo, tu inseguridad con Stella y tu rabia,

translation.en: and your anger right now, all of it, if not worse than you.
translation.es: Tu ansiedad conmigo, tu inseguridad con Stella y tu rabia, lo siento todo más fuerte que tú.

translation.en: That's my gift, if you can call it that.
translation.es: Es mi don, si puedes llamarlo así.

translation.en: I put my headphones on so I can take a break from everyone else's emotions
translation.es: Uso audífonos para descansar de las emociones de los demás

translation.en: and just focus on mine.
But if you really wanna know how I feel…
translation.es: Pero si quieres saber cómo me siento…

translation.en: I chained it up in a barn outside the Barrier.
translation.es: Lo até en un granero afuera de la barrera.

translation.en: - You should've killed it. - And left it in the human world?
translation.es: Debiste matarlo. - ¿Y dejarlo en el mundo humano? - Debiste traerlo aquí y luego matarlo.

translation.en: You should've brought it back here and then killed it.
translation.es: - ¿Y dejarlo en el mundo humano? - Debiste traerlo aquí y luego matarlo.

translation.en: Did it break your skin?
No, I'm not infected.
I've got Ben to make up some oil from the Zanbaq flowers in the greenhouse.
translation.es: Ben preparó aceite de zanbak en el invernadero.

translation.en: I've dosed it. It won't be conscious for hours.
translation.es: Le di y estará horas inconsciente.

translation.en: - Farah… - I need to get in its head.
translation.es: - Farah… - Debo entrar a su mente

translation.en: We need to know if this is an isolated incident or something more.
translation.es: y saber si es un incidente aislado o algo más.

translation.en: Something more?
Like what?
I found a changeling in the First World.
translation.es: Hallé una suplente en el Primer Mundo.

translation.en: A changeling.
I've not heard of one of those in centuries.
translation.es: Hace siglos que no oía hablar de eso.

translation.en: Yet there she was…
left 16 years ago…
right around the time the last Burned One was spotted.
translation.es: Justo cuando vimos al último quemado.

translation.en: You think it's all connected.
I'm struggling, Saul.
translation.es: Se me hace muy difícil, Saul.

translation.en: Rosalind kept so much from us.
I'm worried about the students.
The Alfea they know is very different from the one we attended.
translation.es: Esta Alfea es muy diferente a la nuestra.

translation.en: They have so much life to experience.
Even if this world were safe, what they're going through can feel impossible.
translation.es: Aunque este mundo fuera seguro, lo que viven es muy difícil.

translation.en: But this world isn't safe,
translation.es: Pero este mundo no es seguro.

translation.en: and I don't know how long we'll be able to protect them from it.
translation.es: Y no sé cuánto tiempo podremos protegerlos.

translation.en: I know you feel it.
The… shift.
They've had order for so long, they don't know what chaos feels like.
translation.es: Solo conocen el orden, no saben cómo es el caos.

translation.en: They might soon.
Morning, sunshine.
♪ I wish her well ♪
